column4: Hello, #Ubuntu.  A few years ago, I set up a Dell machine for my father-in-law.  At the time, it was pre-installed with LTS (Hardy).  I switched the machine over to Intrepid to get a few bleeding edge software upgrades installed.  I want to bring the machine up-to-date now.  Should I start making my way towards Lucid or Maverick?  Thanks.
if you have a separate /home I suggest just getting the latest LTS and fresh install leaving the old /home
it'll save you hours of upgrading through several releases and the agony that can bring when things don't work right.
